properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  They serve only high-quality coffee, tea, etc and know a lot about where their products come from. It\'s in the courtyard, behind Penang restaurant. There\'s plenty of parking in a lot farther up the street. It\'s wonderful to be off the street and in the quiet courtyard. Outdoor seating.

properties.name: Branching off of the Kirkland Town Park
properties.description: Posted by Sixtimesseven We used to run these for Clinton Cross Country. In fact, they probably still do run these for Clinton Cross Country, and maybe even Hamilton College Cross Country. One time with the team, Sam and Mack took off their shirts and put them on their heads like turbans. The trails don\'t go very far, definitely not more than 4 miles, but they are lush and clearly marked. Well worth any effort.

properties.name: Lowell Massachussetts
properties.description: Posted by Sixtimesseven Lowell,MassachusettsLowell Massachussetts was the subject of a Death Cab for Cutie song. It is the fourth largest city in the Commonwealth of Massachussetts. You\'ve been forewarned of the shake-shakedown. Opinions stamped on the pulp of the tabloid newsstand gossip that\'s stacked at your door. You swallowed the last of free MA. Car starts, four windows lowered away: last views of cityscapes crumbling. Skyscrapers sink into the ground. All static, no noise: turn the radio down. Those bandwidth signals can\'t reach this far. Don\'t go holding out on me now Don\'t go holding. (I thought that you had come to expect more...)

properties.name: The Root Glen
properties.description: Posted by SixtimessevenClinton, New YorkThis is a Hamilton College set of paths. These paths are very clear and the vegetation is manicured every so often. Important: this set of trails may not be cool for nonresidents or nonHamilton students. That said, the main road that takes you toward Wellin Hall should be taken a left on. After that, go bare to the left of that lane. Then, when you start to see parking lots, go to the first one on your left. Go to the back of that, near the woods, and you should see a sign that says "Root Glen." These paths lead into bigger trails that are very easy to navigate.

properties.name: The naked spy lives here
properties.description: Posted by Sixtimesseven6113 Countryview Lane, Raleigh, North Carolina 27606As she ran away from the CIA, ninja stars grazed her right thigh. Now anyone can identify the naked spy.....

properties.name: Trails behind Jiggy's house
properties.description: Posted by SixtimessevenI reckon nobody can really go behind Jiggy\'s house and randomly start trail hopping, but if you go far enough behind his house, there\'s one "trail" clearing which is the sewer system for Hamilton College, and if you go to your right, that is, north, you\'ll eventually come near the Rogers Estate mansion. Good stuff. Oh yeah, be careful because one time Jiggy and me were hiking back there and we almost got shot by a hunter. whoa!

properties.name: Trails behind the Lacrosse field
properties.description: Posted by SixtimessevenClinton, New YorkBehind the Lacrosse field, there\'s a steep 5 foot drop, and then a plateau of short grass that they keep for sports. Behind that is woods. At the far right corner of the field, there is a patch of tall grass, and then behind it a trail. The trails get tricky if you get off of the path, but they always end within 30 feet of the edge of Route 233.
